data.scheme_name: Assistance to Re-Energize Capital Investments by SMEs (ARISE)
data.benefits: Scheme offers term Loan upto Rs. 5000 Lakhs, subject to maximum of 80% of the Project Cost.
data.eligibility: All MSMEs existing entities for expansion / modernization / technology upgradation minimum two years of operations are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
Cash profit in last audited financial results and audited accounts.
No defaults to Bank/FIs..
data.beneficiaries: All MSMEs existing entities for expansion / modernization / technology upgradation minimum two years of operations are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
Cash profit in last audited financial results and audited accounts.
No defaults to Bank/FIs.
Repayment upto 7 years.
data.nodal_agency: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
data.context: This scheme is to emerge as a single window for meeting the financial and developmental needs of the MSME sector to make it strong, vibrant and globally competitive.
data.objective: The main aim is to provide support to the new and existing SMEs for obtaining growth opportunities.
data.description: Scheme provides loan upto Rs. 5000 lakh subject to maximum of 80% of the project cost and moratorium upto 2 years.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can directly apply through online portal - https://onlineloanappl.sidbi.in/OnlineApplication/
data.funding_facilitator: Small Industries Development Bank of India (SIDBI)
data.funding_mechanism: Amount will be disbursed directly in the account of applicant after the approval by SIDBI.
data.website: Direct Loans  - Small Industries Development Bank of India
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Signed copy of Application form 
2. Self-Attested Copy of Udyam Registration (if applicable) 
3. Self-Attested Copy of the Constitution of the enterprise 
4. Self-Attested Copy of PAN Card of Enterprise 
5. Self-Attested Copy of GST Registration (if applicable) 
6. Copy of ITR of the last financial year (if applicable) 
7. Any Other KYC Documents (if required)
